text: "Lovefool" is a song written by Peter Svensson and Nina Persson for Swedish rock band The Cardigans' third studio album, First Band on the Moon (1996). It was released as the album's lead single on 14 September 1996 in the United Kingdom and internationally on 5 October 1996. ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:The Cardigans songs Category:Bubblegum pop songs
title: Lovefool
